code: import API from"src/axios/axios";export var getProductApi=function getProductApi(param,row){var url="get-all-chairs/".concat(row);if(param){var page=param.split("?")[1];url="get-all-chairs?".concat(page);}return API.get(url);};export var sendGetAdminApi=function sendGetAdminApi(url){var token=localStorage.getItem("token");return API.get(url,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var sendPostAdminApi=function sendPostAdminApi(url,data){var token=localStorage.getItem("token");return API.post(url,data,{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var sendPostApi=function sendPostApi(url,data){return API.post(url,data);};export var sendGetApi=function sendGetApi(url,queryString){var getUrl="".concat(url,"/").concat(queryString);console.log(getUrl);return API.get(getUrl);};export var getApi=function getApi(url){return API.get(url);};
